description: Wordplay on 'one night stand' as both furniture and a fling.
title: Unwanted Emails
n_1: Alex browses furniture when the store clerk approaches.
c1_1: I'm just looking for a night stand.
c2_1: Sure, I’ll sign you up for our offers!
n_2: Alex looks confused as the clerk types on a computer.
c1_2: Wait, I meant just one, for tonight.
c2_2: Don’t worry, you’ll get all the latest deals!
n_3: Alex receives a flood of emails on his phone.
c1_3: Why am I getting so many emails?
c2_3: It’s all the special offers for night stands!
c1_4: No, I meant a one-night stand!
